name: Fruits Garden & Pets - New Sweet Match 3 Blast
name_original: Fruits Garden & Pets - New Sweet Match 3 Blast
description:
Fruits and Birds game is a fun puzzle match-3 game full of love. You need to match birds with the same color fruits to free the cute birds. You’ll be addicted to "Fruit Pop and Pets Heroes" from the first hit!
Join in the world of all birds, the lovely ones are being stuck around fruits and waiting for your help. Rescue them! Each level of game is an absolutely new challenge.

How to play game
- You just arrange birds and fruits in the same color to save them, you pass the level when you rescue enough target birds.
- After each turn of arranging fruits but not saving birds, the birds will jump over a line. If your birds are not rescued early, they will reach the lightning line. 3 birds are not accepted to reach the lightning line.

Features of game
- Explosive bombs destroy 3x3 fruits
- Rockets help to destroy all fruits in a line
- Hammers destroy 1 fruit
- Magician fruits destroy all fruits in the same colour
- Destroy all fruits in a same horizontal line
